Property Description

Letting information:

Furnishing: Unfurnished
Deposit: £995
Letting type: Long term
Added on Rightmove: 22 November 2017 (7 days ago)

Key features

  • GATED DRIVEWAY
  • DETACHED PROPERTY
  • FOUR BEDROOMS
  • TWO RECEPTION ROOMS
  • PERECT FAMILY HOME
  • FRESHLY PAINTED THROUGHOUT

Full description

Tenure: Freehold

Glenwood Property Services proudly present this stunningly spacious four bedroom detached property located in Yardley Wood. Located conveniently between Solihull and Kings Heath this property is ideal for a professional working family.

The property itself has been painted freshly throughout and is available to move into from 27/11/2017.

On the first floor you will find an entrance hallway which leads to two spacious reception rooms both of which benefit from brand new laminate flooring. To the rear of the property you will find a large fully fitted kitchen which includes all major white good including and integrated dishwasher. To rear of the kitchen you will find a small conservatory which leads to the rear garden. There is a w/c on the ground floor which is located under the staircase.

On the first floor you will find three good sized double bedrooms and one single bedroom. The modern family bathroom is also located on the first floor.

The property also benefits from central heating, double glazing a gated driveway and a large double garage.

**CALL THE OFFICE NOW TO ARRANGE YOUR VIEWING**
